Title: Relates to a task force to create a comprehensive plan for the future of the Southampton campus of Stony Brook University
Summary: Establishes a seven member task force to create a comprehensive plan for the future of the Southampton campus of Stony Brook University; empowers the task force to appoint a 15 member community advisory board; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a task force to create a comprehensive plan for the future of the Southampton campus of Stony Brook University
